name: Sonny Moore Dating Simulator
description:
Sonny Moore Dating Simulator is a visual novel, available for FREE on PC, Mac,  and Linux. Attend Dubstep High School, and date one of three familiar faces. Featuring 26 unique endings, experience a branching narrative where your choices matter and effect the story. Socialize with more than 10 other characters! Solve puzzles and engage in turn based combat with varying gameplay at every turn! 
I can't wait to see you in class!
